title: Vegan Chaos: Farewell Meeting
description:
**Today we are pulling down our tents.** We are meeting as vegan hacktivists and beings with an interest in animal rights and sustainability for a farewell meeting - to look back together on what we have experienced and to make concrete arrangements: How do we continue organising the Vegan Chaos Community? What are the next ideas, plans and projects?

There will also be opportunities for personal get-togethers after the Congress: Is a Vegan Chaos travelling group forming for other Chaos events? What else could happen next? Come along, let's put our heads together!

### More Information:

- To the **[Vegan Chaos Community Assembly](https://events.ccc.de/congress/2025/hub/en/assembly/detail/vegan_chaos)**
- Follow us at Mastodon: **[@vegan@chaos.social](//chaos.social/@vegan)**
